data.name: janet
data.value: Hello and welcome to MinnMax! Today, we’re hanging out. It's Ben; it's Leo; and what are y'all up to?

data.name: ben
data.value: Hi Janet Garcia, this is our new show for New Show Plus; it's called Walking Simulator Simulator. So, Leo and I are gonna go for a little stroll along the big money, we call it, as you remember Janet you've seen this bad boy.

data.name: ben
data.value: All right, this is what we call walking; we're going to start doing it, and we're walking MinnMax style.
